title: Ticket #1489: Fix distribution problems with condor_hdfs
description: The condor_hdfs daemon is missing some needed jar files, and in general needs to be fixed so that it works with the public distribution of condor
remarks:
2010-Jul-07 12:40:59 by matt:
Is it going to be possible to use an HDFS from http://hadoop.apache.org/hdfs vs using one bundled with the Condor distribution?

2010-Jul-07 13:13:16 by tstclair:
I could easily change this inside of the cmake build files for the hadoop externals.

2010-Jul-07 14:29:51 by ilikhan:
I reviewed Condor source code for hadoop daemon, there were a few bugs. I fixed them.

Also updated the code to support new version ( 0.20.2 ) of HDFS.

You can either use HDFS package from http://hadoop.apache.org/hdfs or let condor_daemon to manage it.

I tried following test cases: * HDFS package ( 0.20.2 release from Apache) as namenode, condor_hdfs as data node. * condor_hdfs as namenode, another local copy of condor_hdfs as data_node

In both cases I put around 700MB test files. It seems that current code is working without problem. I will commit changes ( in both source code and externals) as soon as possible.
